show.title: Badla Legacy
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने Kuku FM (Android)  पर यह शो सुना और मुझे यकीन है कि आपको भी यह जरूर पसंद आएगा। 
https://links.kukufm.com/kTDws7
show.description: Framed for a crime he never committed, Arjun Choudhary is betrayed by his own family and abandoned by his fiancée Ritika Bajaj. Stripped of his powers and hunted by his brother Ravi and father Rajveer Choudhary, Arjun must rise from ashes with the help of allies like Dhaani Bajaj and the mysterious Amar Betaal. Caught between love, loyalty, and vengeance, Arjun’s battle will decide not just his honor—but the fate of the entire Choudhary legacy. Watch Now!
show.description_secondary: Framed for a crime he never committed, Arjun Choudhary is betrayed by his own family and abandoned by his fiancée Ritika Bajaj. Stripped of his powers and hunted by his brother Ravi and father Rajveer Choudhary, Arjun must rise from ashes with the help of allies like Dhaani Bajaj and the mysterious Amar Betaal. Caught between love, loyalty, and vengeance, Arjun’s battle will decide not just his honor—but the fate of the entire Choudhary legacy. Watch Now!
